A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: **SPOILER FREE**  Rian Johnson is a fan who grew up to become a filmmaker who ended up making a Star Wars film that deconstructs the mythos of a galaxy far\, far away while making it anew. You'll walk out of the theater remembering why you loved these films in the first place\, even if you're disappointed with the entire Canto Bight sequence.
